duties_responsibilities.duty: Organize and deliver quality training for New Members to enhance engagement and retainment.
Coordinate with Team Leadership and Store Trainer to schedule and oversee New Member training.
Facilitate team-specific operational training for Team Members and lead program rollouts.
Train all Team Members on customer service standards, new products, and safety procedures.
Maintain accurate training records, track, and report on training progress using learning systems.
Arrive to the workstation on time, provide excellent customer service, and ensure a clean and safe working environment.
Maximize sales potential, follow established procedures, and report safety hazards and violations.
Adhere to quality goals, lift heavy loads, and work flexible schedules as needed.

education_certification.credential: 6 months of Whole Foods Market experience (or equivalent retail training experience)
